gnu.mapping
Class SFormat

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--gnu.mapping.SFormat
public class SFormat
extends java.lang.Object

A Format to print structured objects on streams. After JDK 1.1 comes out, this should be made compatible with java.text.Format. We will also encapulate formatting flags and pretty-printing here.
